name: technical_diagram
description: Technical and architecture diagrams with clean lines
base_prompt: clean technical diagram, professional illustration, clear layout, minimal design, vector style, labeled components
negative_prompt: photo, realistic, cluttered, handwritten, messy, low resolution, blurry text
alt_text_instructions: Describe what the diagram illustrates - the system, process, or concept shown. Include key components if visible. Be technical but accessible.
